item.title: 南非延长临时签证申请优惠期
item.description: 新宣誓就职的南非内政部长莱昂-施赖伯（Leon Schreiber）已将目前正在等待签证、豁免和上诉申请结果的外国公民的临时优惠政策延长至 12 月 31 日。【原文：Newly sworn in South African Home Affairs Minister Leon Schreiber has extended a temporary concession for foreign nationals who are currently awaiting the outcome of visa, waiver and appeal applications to Dec. 31.】

item.title: 中国经济疲软，全球石油前景面临挑战
item.description: 今年上半年，全球石油市场面临着中国需求前景疲软的问题，这可能会给原油价格带来不利因素。【原文：The global oil market faces soft spots in the outlook for Chinese demand this half, potentially adding a headwind for crude prices.】

item.title: 铃木在印度启动 4000 万美元基金帮助农村初创企业
item.description: 铃木汽车公司在印度启动了一项 4000 万美元的基金，用于投资农村小型企业，这家日本汽车制造商的目标是进一步提升其在全球增长最快的市场之一的地位。【原文：Suzuki Motor Corp. launched a $40 million fund in India to invest in small rural businesses as the Japanese automaker aims to further boost its presence in one of the world’s fastest-growing markets.】

item.title: 德国工厂订单意外下滑，经济复苏乏力
item.description: 德国 5 月份的工厂订单出人意料地大幅下降，这是欧洲最大经济体复苏遭遇的最新挫折。【原文：German factory orders unexpectedly plummeted in May — the latest setback to the recovery in Europe’s largest economy.】

item.title: 英国股市有望在大选日延续涨势
item.description: 2024 年 5 月 13 日星期一，英国伦敦，通勤者在塔桥上行走。担心官方劳动力市场数据准确性的英国经济学家又有了新的担忧：对未填补工作岗位数量的怀疑。摄影师：Jason Alden/Bloomberg【原文：Commuters walk in view of Tower Bridge in London, UK, on Monday, May 13, 2024. British economists worried about the accuracy of official labour market data have a new concern: doubts about the number of unfilled jobs. Photographer: Jason Alden/Bloomberg】

item.description:

item.title: 现金充裕的能源交易商正在从大型石油公司手中抢购炼油厂
item.description: 资金充裕的大宗商品交易商们正在收购能源巨头们越来越不愿意收购的炼油厂。【原文：Commodities traders flush with cash are buying oil refineries that energy majors are increasingly turning their back on.】

item.title: 泰国称国债增加不会挤垮私营部门
item.description: 财政部公共债务顾问 Jindarat Viriyataveekul 表示，泰国拥有充足的流动性来应对政府为弥补预算赤字而增加的借贷以及近 140 亿美元的现金援助。【原文：Thailand has ample enough liquidity to handle a rise in government borrowing to fund the budget deficit and an almost $14 billion cash handout, said Jindarat Viriyataveekul, the finance ministry’s public debt advisor.】

item.title: 比特币因拜登闹剧和与 Mt.
item.description: 比特币连续第三个交易日下滑，使该数字资产接近2月份的水平，当时面临的挑战包括美国政治剧变和Mt.Gox交易所倒闭后债权人处置比特币的可能性。【原文：A third-straight daily slide in Bitcoin took the digital asset close to levels last seen in February amid challenges including US political drama and the potential for disposals by creditors of the failed Mt. Gox exchange.】

item.title: 拜登和英国的独立日
item.description:
市场正在设法应对美国的危机和法国的最新革命。今天的大选让英国似乎成了 1776 年以来的赢家。【原文：

Markets are finding a way to live with America’s crisis and France’s latest revolution. And today’s election makes the UK seem the winner from 1776.

】

item.title: 南非罕见的出口成功因港口崩溃而受到威胁
item.description:
在经济停滞不前的情况下，南非不断增长的水果出口一直是一个难得的亮点。现在，它们也岌岌可危。【原文：

South Africa’s growing fruit exports have been a rare bright spot in a stagnant economy. Now they are in peril as well.

】

item.title: 法国投票前最后一次债券销售将衡量投资者的愤怒情绪
item.description: 法国在最后一轮大选前的最后一次债券销售将显示投资者如何应对投票带来的不确定性，这次投票扰乱了市场并引发了对国家财政的担忧。【原文：France’s last bond sale before a final election round will show how investors are grappling with the uncertainty of a vote that has roiled markets and triggered concerns for the nation’s finances.】

item.title: 中国需求有望改善，铁矿石创本月新高
item.description: 铁矿石触及近一个月来的最高点，因为交易商押注中国钢铁市场将略有改善。【原文：Iron ore touched its highest in nearly a month as traders bet on a modest improvement for China’s steel market.】

item.title: 银行股和电力行业推动印度市场红火发展
item.description: 在交易日开始之前，我们为您带来可能影响市场的重要新闻和事件摘要。【原文：Before the trading day starts we bring you a digest of the key news and events that are likely to move markets.】

item.title: EFG Hermes 的 ECM 负责人称海湾地区 IPO 渠道 "极为活跃
item.description: 海湾地区的股权资本市场繁荣没有放缓的迹象，据该地区今年最大的 ECM 银行称，电子商务和信息技术公司有望在下半年上市。【原文：An equity capital markets boom in the Gulf shows no signs of slowing down, with e-commerce and information technology companies among those expected to go public in the second half, according to the top ECM bank in the region this year.】

item.title: 中国低廉的股票价值吸引了价值 1010 亿澳元的澳大利亚养老金
item.description: Colonial First State 正盯上打折的中国证券，试图提高其在新兴市场的投资，以实现投资组合的多样化。【原文：Colonial First State is eyeing discounted China securities as it seeks to lift its emerging markets exposure to diversify its portfolio.】

item.title: 日本股市延续涨势，Topix 与日经指数齐创历史新高
item.description: 日本 Topix 股指一举突破泡沫时代的峰值，创下历史新高，这是因为买入势头超越了少数股票，凸显了涨势的坚实基础。【原文：Japan’s Topix stock index powered past its bubble-era peak to a record high, as the buying momentum spread beyond a narrow set of stocks and underscored the firm foundations of the rally.】

item.title: 习近平的中国在官员海外路演中难以推销
item.description: 响应习近平主席的号召，中国官员正蜂拥出国吸引外国资本。他们向投资者的推销受到了质疑，部分原因是他们的大老板的政策。【原文：Chinese officials are flocking abroad to answer President Xi Jinping’s call to woo foreign capital. Their pitch to investors is being met with doubt, partly due to the policies of their big boss.】

item.title: 开始一天生活所需的五件事亚洲
item.description: 早上好。民主党议员考虑要求乔-拜登退出美国总统选举。沃洛德梅尔-泽连斯基（Volodymyr Zelenskiy）要求唐纳德-特朗普解释其结束与俄罗斯战争的计划。斯里兰卡同意120亿美元债券重组条款。市场动态— 塞巴斯蒂安-博伊德【原文：Good morning. Democratic lawmakers consider asking Joe Biden to pull out of the US presidential election. Volodymyr Zelenskiy challenges Donald Trump to explain his plan for ending the war with Russia. Sri Lanka agreed terms for a $12 billion bond restructuring. Here’s what’s moving markets — Sebastian Boyd】

item.title: 普华永道在中国举步维艰，客户和员工纷纷外流
item.description: 普华永道会计师事务所（PricewaterhouseCoopers LLP）在中国的监管问题导致客户外流，并导致其部分会计师到竞争对手处求职，使该事务所在世界第二大经济体的前景受到质疑。【原文：PricewaterhouseCoopers LLP’s regulatory troubles in China have caused an exodus of clients and led some of its accountants to seek out jobs at rivals, casting doubt over the firm’s prospects in the world’s second-largest economy.】

item.title: 调查称莫迪预算案将推动印度股市飙升
item.description: 据市场观察家称，受政府支出和企业盈利持续增长的推动，印度 5 万亿美元的股市全年涨幅将高达 20%。【原文：India’s $5 trillion stock market stands to gain as much as 20% for the entire year, buoyed by government spending and continued momentum in corporate earnings, according to market watchers.】

item.title: 台湾掉期创新高促使反思超额加息押注
item.description: 由于央行的鹰派举措使掉期利率接近历史高位，交易商正寻求减少对台湾政策收紧的过度押注。【原文：Traders are looking to trim excessive policy tightening bets in Taiwan as hawkish central bank moves keep swap rates near record highs.】

item.title: 在 S&P 500 指数创下新高后，亚洲股市开始上涨：市场综述
item.description: 由于经济数据支持美联储降息，美股触及新高，周四亚洲股市将上扬。【原文：Stocks in Asia were set to advance Thursday after US shares touched a fresh peak as economic data supported the case for Federal Reserve rate cuts.】

item.title: Discover 同意就多收商家费用的集体诉讼达成和解
item.description: 同意被 Capital One Financial Corp.收购的信用卡公司发现金融服务公司（Discover Financial Services）表示，该公司已就解决向商家多收费用的集体诉讼达成协议。【原文：Discover Financial Services, the credit-card firm that agreed to be acquired by Capital One Financial Corp., said it reached an agreement to resolve class-action litigation for overcharging merchants.】

item.title: 贸易紧张局势升级，中国电动汽车捍卫欧洲市场份额
item.description: 在旨在保护本土汽车制造商免受低成本进口汽车冲击的新关税出台之前，中国电动汽车品牌在5月份继续保持着在下滑的欧洲电动汽车市场上的份额。【原文：Chinese electric-car brands held on to their share of the slumping European EV market in May, ahead of new tariffs designed to protect local carmakers from their lower-cost imports.】

item.title: 勒庞谴责对手阻止极右翼掌权的努力
item.description: 极右翼领导人玛丽娜-勒庞抨击埃马纽埃尔-马克龙总统的中间派集团和一个左翼联盟联手阻挠她的国民联盟党在法国立法选举第二轮也是最后一轮中获得绝对多数。【原文：Far-right leader Marine Le Pen lashed out at President Emmanuel Macron’s centrist group and a left-wing alliance for joining forces to block her National Rally party from getting an absolute majority in the second and final round of the French legislative election.】

item.title: 刚果完成国际货币基金组织（IMF）首次高级别贷款计划
item.description: 总部位于华盛顿特区的国际货币基金组织周三宣布，世界第二大铜生产国刚果民主共和国有史以来首次完成了该组织的贷款计划。【原文：Democratic Republic of Congo, the world’s second-biggest copper producer, completed an International Monetary Fund loan program for the first time in its history, the Washington DC-based lender announced Wednesday.】

item.title: 富时罗素将巴基斯坦股票降级为前沿市场股票
item.description: 富时罗素将巴基斯坦从二级新兴市场降至前沿市场地位，对该国股票造成打击，并可能导致数百万美元资金外流。【原文：Pakistan was lowered to frontier market status from secondary emerging market by FTSE Russell, dealing a blow to the nation’s equities and potentially driving millions of dollars in outflows.】

item.title: 对冲基金在澳大利亚 2.6 万亿美元养老金中失宠
item.description: 随着监管机构对澳大利亚养老基金的费用和业绩审查日益严格，世界上增长最快的退休资金池之一正在减少对对冲基金的投资。【原文：One of the world’s fastest growing pools of retirement capital is reducing its investments in hedge funds as regulatory scrutiny grows on fees and performance at Australian pension funds.】

item.title: 阿美石油公司和阿德诺克公司考虑竞购天然气生产商桑托斯公司
item.description: 知情人士称，沙特阿美石油公司和阿布扎比国家石油公司一直在分别研究对澳大利亚桑托斯有限公司（Santos Ltd.）的潜在竞购，因为这两家中东能源巨头正寻求加强其在海外的天然气投资。【原文：Saudi Aramco and Abu Dhabi National Oil Co. have been separately studying potential bids for Australia’s Santos Ltd., as the Middle Eastern energy giants seek to ramp up their gas investments overseas, people with knowledge of the matter said.】
